meanings.sent1: She redrew the picture to make it better.
meanings.sent2: He redrew the map to correct the mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The artist redrew the sketch with a new perspective.
meanings.sent4: After the rain, nature redrew the landscape with fresh colors.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the student to redrew the diagram for clarity.

meanings.definition: To draw or trace again in a different way
meanings.sent1: They redrew the design to add more details.
meanings.sent2: The architect redrew the building plans for a modern look.
meanings.sent3: In the game, players redrew the map to confuse their opponents.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination redrew the scene into a magical wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The author redrew the characters in a new light for the sequel.
